group.label: Order status
group.comment: Define shopper actions or payment statuses that trigger custom statuses that the plugin assigns to your orders. This provides better understanding of the orderâ€™s progress and ensures a smooth experience.

field.label: Order creation
field.tooltip: The status assigned to orders that have been created, but the payment result has not yet been confirmed by a webhook from Adyen.

field.label: Payment authorisation
field.tooltip: The status for orders for which an AUTHORISATION webhook from Adyen confirmed that the payment amount has been authorized. Note: an authorisation status via the result URL does not trigger this status.

field.label: Payment capture for virtual products
field.tooltip: (optional) Select only status assigned to state complete. Leave empty to use the same as normal products

field.label: Pending bank transfer/SEPA orders
field.tooltip: By default, Adyen does not inform your Adobe Commerce store about pending payments. If you want to receive these webhooks, go to the Adyen Customer Area and set up a PENDING webhook by enabling the BankTransfer pending webhook and the Direct-debit pending webhook.

field.label: Payment confirmed
field.tooltip: Status assigned to orders after the capture result is confirmed with a webhook. For immediate captures, the AUTHORISATION webhook confirms a capture. For manual captures, the result is confirmed with a CAPTURE webhook.

field.label: Order cancellation
field.tooltip: Status given to orders after order cancellation is confirmed by a CANCEL_OR_REFUND webhook from Adyen. If orders are already invoiced, they cannot be cancelled, but will be refunded instead.

field.label: Send order confirmation email for Bank Transfer/SEPA
field.tooltip: If you enabled the PENDING webhook for transfer and SEPA payments, set to Yes to send a confirmation email to the shopper after the order is placed, while it is pending payment.
